intro: Psychotria montisstellaris, commonly known as the Star Mountain Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of Ecuador. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of mostly tropical plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale green flowers. It thrives in shaded, humid environments and is often found in cloud forests. Due to its restricted habitat, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
